column5: Now the entire world knows your antics.  Looking forward to seeing it.
Hey Im no pro just a joe, had fun that day shooting mike D's first Canadian show, here is a promo for it should air   May 3rd  http://lunkerville.com/lunkerville1/movies/tidbitformilo.mov
Thanks for the link, always enjoy watching Lunkerville. Give us a reminder when the show comes on next month!  MTBF
I was just watching Lunkerville last week and got to wondering when your show was gonna be on.  Looking forward to seeing it.
That looks like it will be a good show.

I can't wait to see the Show I'd like to see what happened on your boat that day, we sure got nailed by rain & wind that day put we did pretty good as far as the bass go, wish we would have caught up to you SBK
Milo, that vid had me rolling man!!!  Great job!
Nice bromantic comedy.
show is airing Tuesday night WFN at 10 pm as Mike D said to me the other day get beer and cheesies, Hope you have a good chuckle, as its not there to teach more to entertain
thnx for the reminder going to pvr it
That Mike dude seems like a good guy. I enjoy his show - it's different.
Hey that's awesome I look forward to watching it. He sure does seem like a good guy and I like how he goes out with a local fisherman and experience what that average fisherman does.
I enjoyed that. Probably the best episode I have seen of Lunkerville
glad you liked it, its on again tonight at 630
Well done, I watched it at 6:00 this morning and it was a really good episode.  Alot of todays fishing shows could take a lesson from Lunkerville.
I missed it last night and now I'm going to miss it again because of a charity thing, aaaaaaah crap...
I caught it, way to stick it out and getting those docks to work.  First trip to Canada for Mike D, you were a great host!  Nice boat
Good job, caught it at 10 last night. I want to be in that boat on that show a couple years down the road
Milo, did you make him stop for shore lunch?
Bill it was all about the burger lol
I saw the McDonalds bag in the back of the Jeep!!!  hahahaha!
Lou I'm guessing you have a copy of this? I don't get WFN and would love to see it.
no I dont Mike but I think he posts his video's to his site once they go through a rotation...you've fished enough with me mike to know my antics.....  Next show if there is one will have sonic's
Its not a bad show -he gets some pretty good guys on it, -will try to catch the episode NG-good stuff!

A big thanks to Milo for taking me on my first Canadian fishing adventure!  As usual on Lunkerville, we had our obstacles, but we fought it out and Milo put us on fish.  And we finished the day with some burgers and beer, which is always a sweet way to complete the day.  I really enjoyed my time with the Hamburgler Milo and I continued the fun in the editing room.  Next stop: Montreal!
